WorkItem.ClosedComment: We'll add this once ES6 is actually finalized, but not until then.
WorkItem.Description: I want to use TypeScript to write Firefox Jetpack add-ons in which I can use whatever is supported by the Firefox JS engine (including let, const, arrow functions, for-of loops). It would be good if ES6 could be chosen as a target so that these features remained in the JS as I put them in the TS.
